attributes.action: pay a ransom for the release of Paul and Rachel Chandler from Somali pirates
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The situation of the Chandlers is becoming dire, and negotiations as to a ransom is the only sensible way forward in what is a lose-lose predicament. The bankers could rehabilitate themselves somewhat by funding the ransom.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
